glycation.text: The Glycation section provides a list of non-enzymatic, covalently linked glycans reported for the site of the protein.
glycation.title: Glycation

general.text: The General section provides identifying information about the protein the side is found on. This includes protein identifier, names and source organism.
general.title: General

sequence.text: The Sequence section provides an interactive display of the amino acid sequence with the current site being highlighted. Controls can be used to navigate to other sites on the same protein.
sequence.title: Sequence

glycosylation.text: The Glycosylation section provides a list of glycans attached to the selected site of the protein.
glycosylation.title: Glycosylation

snv.text: The Single Nucleotide Variation (SNV) section provides information on disease and non-disease associated mutations on the site of the protein. These are most commonly nonsynonymous mutations which cause a different amino acid to be produced at a given position.
snv.title: Single Nucleotide Variation

phosphorylation.text: The Phosphorylation section provides a list of kinase proteins responsible for phosphorylation on the selected site of the protein.
phosphorylation.title: Phosphorylation

mutagenesis.text: The Mutagenesis section provides a list of experimental change of the amino acid on the site of the protein together with a description of the effects of the change.
mutagenesis.title: Mutagenesis
